# noResponder(for:)

**Instance Method**

Handles the case where an event or action message falls off the end of the responder chain.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func noResponder(for eventSelector: Selector)
```

## Parameters

- **eventSelector**: A selector identifying the action or event message.

## Discussion

The default implementation beeps if `eventSelector` is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSResponder/keyDown(with:)].
title: noResponder(for:)
